channel.title: Baltic Honeybadger 2019 on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Baltic Honeybadger 2019 on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Coldcard Mk3 - Security in Depth
item.description: Intro My name is Rodolfo, I have been around Bitcoin for a little while. We make hardware. Today I wanted to get a little bit into how do you make a hardware wallet secure in a little bit more layman’s terms. Go through the process of getting that done. What were the options When I closed my last company and decided to find a place to store my coins I couldn’t really find a wallet that satisfied two things that I needed.
